text: Va [ej pajomʙar, jod kun az] hangome ki Alloh taolo Iʙrohimro ʙo suxanon [-i farogir ʙar ahkomu takolifi sar'i] ozmud va u hamaro ʙa xuʙi ʙa ancom rasond. [Alloh taolo ʙa vaj] Farmud: "Man turo pesvoi mardum qaror mediham". [Iʙrohim] guft: "[Parvardigoro] Az farzandonam [niz pesvojone qaror ʙideh, to mardum ʙa onon iqtido kunand]".
